About Our research group at USF performs interdisciplinary research in many fields of computer science, and is led by Prof. Prasant Mohapatra . We work at the forefront of Machine Learning (Theory, Fairness, Interpretability, Adversarial Attacks, Federated Learning), IoT Devices (Security), mmWave Sensing (V2V Communications), and Game Theoretic Cyber-Security (Multiple Attackers and Defenders). Location : 3820 USF Alumni Drive, Tampa, FL 33620 Recent News Our paper "Development and clinical validation of Swaasa AI platform for screening and prioritization of pulmonary TB" has been accepted for publication to Nature Scientific Reports Our paper "Robust Fair Clustering: A Novel Fairness Attack and Defense Framework" has been accepted for publication in the ICLR 2023 Main Conference Our paper "Federated Learning Hyper-Parameter Tuning From A System Perspective" has been accepted for publication in the IEEE IoT Journal Our paper "Towards System-Level Security Analysis of IoT Using Attack Graphs" has been accepted for publication to IEEE Transactions on Mobile Computing Our paper "On the Robustness of Deep Clustering Models" has been accepted for publication at NeurIPS 2022 Subscribe to Recent Articles
